This places a “Reserve Order” for an out of stock item. By doing this, you are reserving both the current advertised price and your position in line to receive the item from our next available shipment.

We do not guarantee your wait time. However, if your item is still not available after 90 days, and you no longer wish to wait, you may request a full refund.

Canceling a “Reserve Order” within the first 90 days will result in a 10% cancellation fee.

Next Day Shipping is NOT available when:
  1. You pay with a check, echeck, or lay-a-way
  2. You do not pick a valid FFL dealer we already have on file
  3. You order after 12:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

With all the features of the popular SR9® and the award winning SR9c®, the Ruger SR40® is possibly the easiest recoiling, smoothest shooting .40 on the market.

Reviewed By: Spencer B on 04/29/2014 Rating: [5 of 5 Stars!]
Damn fine weapon!! Have had this beauty for over 3 years now, put well over 4,000 rounds through it, and not once has it malfunctioned in anyway. The second I picked this gun up from my FFL I knew I had made a good choice. This baby fits and feels perfectly in your hand. The sights were perfect right out of the box, no adjustments needed; dead on accurate! It's also extremely easy to take apart and clean. The quality of this gun is top notch!! For a little over $400 dollars, you will feel like you have a $700-$800 pistol. I would absolutely recommend this gun to anyone looking for an extremely reliable and affordable weapon. I would trust this gun with my life in a SHTF scenario. Don't think about buying it, just do it, you won't regret it. Buds is my go to source for weapons and accessories, and you can't beat their customer service! I want to thank Gurney for such a smooth trade in on my Sig Sauer mosquito as well. He quoted me, I shipped them my gun, they put that money towards my Ruger SR40, and I just had to pay the difference! Couldn't be anymore happier with Buds service!!

Reviewed By: Kyle T on 11/09/2013 Rating: [5 of 5 Stars!]
Bud's was awesome, quick shipping and great service. The SR 40 is awesome and my wife loved it also!!! I highly recommend this gun and Bud's! I will be a repeat customer!!!!

Reviewed By: Ian K on 10/15/2013 Rating: [5 of 5 Stars!]

Reviewed By: Ralph C on 10/05/2013 Rating: [5 of 5 Stars!]
I am a first time gun buyer and I was very pleased with Buds customer service! I paid the pistol off and it was shipped and received by my FFL dealer in only two days! Now, about the Sr40..AWESOME piece of weaponry. I opened the box and found everything inside I was supposed to. The finish on the pistol is a very nice look and the weight is not what I expected at all. I haven't been able to fire the weapon yet but it passed 2 safety inspections so I know I'm good to go. I love my new Ruger and Thank you, Buds!

Display Product Review on Full Page
Reviewed By: Robert M on 07/01/2013 Rating: [4 of 5 Stars!]
Purchased the SR40 from Buds about a month ago and the process was great, Buds sent me the info on my order and was updated as it went to the process. Picked up the gun at the FFL and all was good. The SR40 is a nice pistol, shot accurately and smoothly. This was the first time i've shot a handgun in 30 years and was amazed at how well i was able to shoot it. I was way more accurate than my friend with his M&P .40 at around 20 feet. I shot 100 rounds without any problems. I would recommend the SR40 and also Buds.
